title: This game is just full of C****

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
At least at low rank that is all it is, fuckers who all they look at is the bad and give no shits about anything good or have any brain how to win.

Apparently in that game I linked, I was carried, well according to Braum I was, who all game kept complaining about me ulting Blitz 3 times. Instead he wanted me to go balls to the wall and ult someone else. Anyone with even half a brain would know that is a dumb idea when the tanks are still alive.

EVERY SINGLE FUCKING GAME there are players who non stop bitch, complain, moan and groan about EVERYTHING that is USELESS and don't care to see what is actually making you lose. 90% of that game Olaf was never with the team, and you can tell by his KDA, and even with him always roaming, he STILL didn't even get top Damage Dealt.

We were 4v5 most of that game and got down to one Nexus turret (only lost one inhibitor thankfully), all 5v5 team fights we won, so instead of asking Olaf to join us in the team fights, Braum wanted me to Ult someone in the back line who I couldn't even reach unless I flashed in, which we all know how that would have went.

I managed to get a 44 second CDR on my ult, which somehow dropped from 55 seconds? That makes NO SENSE AT ALL! So one Ult EVERY SINGLE TEAM FIGHT, but NOOOO, FUCKING NOOOO, ulting Blitz being the only one I can reach to stop him from initiating IS NOT FUCKING GOOD ENOUGH! Yet somehow, SOME FUCKING HOW we WON every single 5v5 team fight! FUCK! THIS! COMMUNITY! Brainless fucking twats who would rather complain about who you are ulting than to try and keep us in a 5v5 fight so we can win the game.

Seriously fuck low rank, I am stuck there because players have no brains in knowing what actually needs to be done game to game to win. If we are losing 4v5, winning all 5v5 and split pushing is only making us fall behind, STOP SPLIT PUSHING! IT IS NOT HELPING!

TL;DR

We lost EVERY 4v5 or worse fight and won EVERY 5v5 fight, I ulted Blitz 3 times and it was ALLLLLL MY FAULT we almost lost. I got top damage as usual, and contrary to popular believe, that DOES actually help, it ensures enemies are dying so we can kill them. SOMEONE has to do the damage, I don't give a fuck who gets the kills, without the damage being done, NO ONE will get any kills.

replies.body:
> 
>Olaf was never with the team, and you can tell by his KDA, and even with him always roaming, he STILL didnt even get top Damage Dealt.
> 
 

Olaf was involved in one more kill than you. 4+11=15 where as 9+5=14. So what exactly can you tell from his KDA?

Also why did you take Nashors as your third item? I'm no Malz main so I don't know how it would work with him but by looking at some recent builds I haven't seen anyone take it.

He's right, you shouldn't be ulting blitz. Ulting literally any other member of their team would have been more useful. The amount of damage your ult does aside, using your best ability to lockdown the support, while taking yourself out of the fight is not worth it. While I'm sure there are situations where ulting the blitz would make sense the majority of the time it would have been better to save it, or ult the Darius.

If you can read, or have a brain, THREE times I ulted Blitz because I couldn't get to anyone else in the entire game with a new ult every team fight.

So what do you want me to do, jump into the enemy team and ult someone else just to die? Or ult Blitz and stop him initiating?

Silence the blitz and save your ult. If you ult the blitz your taking you and the blitz out of the fight for the duration of your ult. Your team will miss you more than their team will miss blitz. 

Just stay away from the blitz and use your other spells while you wait for a chance to ult someone that's worth it.

> [{quoted}](name=Mozzie25,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=8PVEOIZ7,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2016-07-03T22:38:34.201+0000)
>
> Silence the blitz and save your ult. If you ult the blitz your taking you and the blitz out of the fight for the duration of your ult. Your team will miss you more than their team will miss blitz. 
> 
> Just stay away from the blitz and use your other spells while you wait for a chance to ult someone that's worth it.

he could just not play malz, after the nerfs he isnt that strong anymore.

If you can read, or have a brain, THREE times I ulted Blitz because I couldn't get to anyone else in the entire game with a new ult every team fight.

So what do you want me to do, jump into the enemy team and ult someone else just to die? Or ult Blitz and stop him initiating?
or stop being a shit %%%% and position yourself

Taking the tank out is always handy before s**t goes down, but only if it doesn't cost you a loss and your CD's will be ready for the actual fight.
I get what you were playing at, it's pointless going in to take out their damage dealers in the back if you are going to get slaughtered before having any real impact. And when you die youre obviously out of the team fight.
But as mentioned by Mozzie25, your ULT still takes you temporarily out of the team fight anyway. And given blitz cant really do a huge amount of damage to your team on his own, his only threat to the team is dragging 1 of you in, so blitz should probably be last on the kill list.
Maybe you could have tried baiting blitz to grab you, and be quick on your spell immunity, then your team can jump in while you suppress one of their damage dealers? Never played {{champion:90}} myself I don't know his mechanics, just by what I've seen. But your team comp had a workable platform for initiating the fight imo. I guess not every individual plays on the same wave length as another.

At the end of the day, you won the game and that's what matters. Flaming your team for targeting the wrong champ gets the team no where, too many are quick to flame before instructing, and this results in sloppy team fights.
So I totally agree this game is full of hot headed flamers, and some just have no people skills and cant instruct properly and it comes across as rude or condescending. But some players, asshats or not, do have some good ideas and tactics, which daily I myself am taking on-board. Team doesn't always win but at-least my game is improving.

TL;DR

I think you'll find most agree that blitz is never a high priority. If you can't out brute the enemy, out smart them.

Some Blitz, especially the ones who initiate the fight and can actually pull of a decent grab, are more important in some fights.

I get what you are saying about my ult taking me out of the fight, but in reality no, I get Blitz at max range making it equally as hard for them to get to me, PLUS it puts down a pool that damages anyone who tries to get close, and that shit can hurt.

The few times I did ult blitz helped us win the fight, but sadly most of this community has zero idea how to play outside the norm and think "Save your ult for the squishy" in 100% of the fights. That cannot always work, no matter how good you can play, if you cannot get to them thanks to a special someone knowing how to play, I might as well use it on them and help get the fight started in our favour.

> [{quoted}](name=Omni Presents,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=8PVEOIZ7,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-06-29T13:25:15.654+0000)
>

Instead he wanted me to go balls to the wall and ult someone else. Anyone with even half a brain would know that is a dumb idea when the tanks are still alive.

Yet somehow, SOME FUCKING HOW we WON every single 5v5 team fight! FUCK! THIS! COMMUNITY! Brainless fucking twats who would rather complain about who you are ulting than to try and keep us in a 5v5 fight so we can win the game.
>

I got top damage as usual, and contrary to popular believe, that DOES actually help, it ensures enemies are dying so we can kill them. SOMEONE has to do the damage, I don&#039;t give a fuck who gets the kills, without the damage being done, NO ONE will get any kills.

'every game, someone btches and Moans' yourself?
I bitch and moan here, not in game.
My daily salt intake was used up in the first sentence
